meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the Andes mountain range.
meanings.sent1: The hikers marveled at the andesitic peaks of the Andes towering above them.
meanings.sent2: The andesitic landscape of the Andes was breathtakingly beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The andesitic mountains of the Andes seemed to whisper secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like andesitic gems found in the heart of the Andes.
meanings.sent5: The andesitic terrain of the Andes painted a picture of rugged beauty.

meanings.definition: Composed of or resembling andesite rock.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the andesitic rock formations in the quarry.
meanings.sent2: The andesitic boulders had a unique texture and color.
meanings.sent3: The andesitic stones in the garden seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed off the andesitic cliffs, resonating through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The andesitic material felt cool and solid beneath her fingertips.
